snippet: Georgia confirmed it would take part in next year’s Sochi Olympics in Russia. Georgia’s participation had been in doubt because of resentment about the war with Russia in 2008.
abstract: Georgia confirms it will take part in 2014 Olympics in Sochi, Russia; former Soviet republic's participation had been in doubt because of tensions with Russia.
lead_paragraph: Georgia confirmed it would take part in next year’s Sochi Olympics in Russia. Georgia’s participation had been in doubt because of resentment about the war with Russia in 2008.

headline.main: Georgian Athletes Going to Sochi Olympics
